verses.verse: (A Psalm of David.) O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> I call <S%H7121><s%> upon Thee; hasten <S%H2363><s%> to me! Give <S%H238><s%> ear <S%H238><s%> to my voice <S%H6963><s%> when I call <S%H7121><s%> to Thee!

May my prayer <S%H8605><s%> be counted <S%H3559><s%> as incense <S%H7004><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Thee; The lifting <S%H4864><s%> up of my hands <S%H3709><s%> as the evening <S%H6153><s%> offering. <S%H4503><s%>
Set <S%H7896><s%> a guard, <S%H8108><s%> O Lord, <S%H3068><s%> over my mouth; <S%H6310><s%> Keep <S%H5341><s%> watch <S%H5341><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> the door <S%H9087><s%> of my lips. <S%H8193><s%>

Do not incline <S%H5186><s%> my heart <S%H3820><s%> to any evil <S%H7451><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> To practice <S%H9412><s%> deeds <S%H9412><s%> of wickedness <S%H7562><s%> With men <S%H376><s%> who do <S%H6466><s%> iniquity; <S%H205><s%> And do not let me eat <S%H9237><s%> of their delicacies. <S%H4516><s%>

Let the righteous <S%H6662><s%> smite <S%H1986><s%> me in kindness <S%H2617><s%> and reprove <S%H3198><s%> me; It is oil <S%H8081><s%> upon the head; <S%H7218><s%> Do not let my head <S%H7218><s%> refuse <S%H5106><s%> it, For still <S%H5750><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%> is against their wicked <S%H9567><s%> deeds. <S%H9567><s%>

Their judges <S%H8199><s%> are thrown <S%H8058><s%> down <S%H8058><s%> by the sides <S%H3027><s%> of the rock, <S%H5553><s%> And they hear <S%H8085><s%> my words, <S%H561><s%> for they are pleasant. <S%H5276><s%>

As when one plows <S%H6398><s%> and breaks <S%H1234><s%> open <S%H1234><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> Our bones <S%H6106><s%> have been scattered <S%H6340><s%> at the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of Sheol. <S%H7585><s%>

For my eyes <S%H5869><s%> are toward <S%H413><s%> Thee, O God, <S%H3068><s%> the Lord; <S%H136><s%> In Thee I take <S%H2620><s%> refuge; <S%H2620><s%> do not leave <S%H6168><s%> me defenseless. <S%H6168><s%> <S%H5315><s%>

Keep <S%H8104><s%> me from the jaws <S%H3027><s%> of the trap <S%H6341><s%> which they have set <S%H3369><s%> for me, And from the snares <S%H4170><s%> of those who do <S%H6466><s%> iniquity. <S%H205><s%>
Let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> fall <S%H5307><s%> into their own nets, <S%H4364><s%> While <S%H5704><s%> I pass <S%H5674><s%> by safely. <S%H3162><s%>
